title: kuDi iruppAi manamE
sahitya:
kuDi iruppAi manamE annai aruLil kudi iruppAi manamE


anupallavi

  aDiyArkk-amaidi tarum kaDi malar shOlaiyil anbut-tiru manaiyil inbam perugi varak-


caraNam    ghana dhana mayakkattil karuttai viTTalaiyAmal kanavilum kAmAdi kaLLarAl ulaiyAmal
mana mozhi meyyinAl punita pUjanai sheidE inivinai uDalinil enraikkum piravAmal
